claim: Zambia is bordered to the south by Zaire.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Zambia  (  -LSB- ˈzæmbiə -RSB-  )  , officially the Republic of Zambia , is a landlocked country in Southern Africa , neighbouring the Democratic Republic of the Congo to the north , Tanzania to the north-east , Malawi to the east , Mozambique , Zimbabwe , Botswana and Namibia to the south , and Angola to the west .
